extended_tweet.full_text:
This is how Easter was celebrated in Kerala before 1947

After Easter Service, Christians shouted "poyin, poyin"( "Go away..go away") before they took out procession in the street

This was a warning to Dalits  to keep off the street and not pollute Christians by their presence https://t.co/hwe8EekliZ
